title: About these animal champions. . . .

replies.body: We don't talk about her, man. We just forget about her.

> [{quoted}](name=Embertine,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=GqiUIjTj,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-02T23:19:17.114+0000)
> We have a scorpion made of stone and crystal that drags people screaming into his den to "feel his sting". {{champion:72}} 
> 

Lmfao, this made me laugh so hard.  I did this in game once.  It was ARAM and i was playing a female champ and the skarner kept ulting me all the damn time, so i said in /all NO, I do not want to bear your young, so please stop trying to drag me back to your den.

He responded with... but i got you flowers.

I also have an ARAM Skarner story.

Every single team fight I grabbed Katarina out of (or right before) her ult. She yelled at me in /all and I replied "I was told diamonds are a girl's best friend, so I turned _into_ a diamond."
you actually thought he was a turtle? even his champion title is _Rammus, the Amordillo_

> [{quoted}](name=The True Bard,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=GqiUIjTj,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-01-03T04:43:23.837+0000)
>
> {{champion:121}} We have a Cockroach.

and a shark{{champion:421}}

Isn't he a praying mantis though?

Is my life a lie?
Rammus is turtle {{champion:33}}  no point in adding same animal again

I resent that statement.


Rammus can also say "Right."
we have a turtle MAN on Udyr, does it count?

> [{quoted}](name=esmelar,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=GqiUIjTj,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-01-03T01:57:48.992+0000)
>
> we have a turtle MAN on Udyr, does it count?

No, Udyr is an escapee from the island of Dr. Mundo. ;)
no mention of elise and ahri.
Isn't {{champion:267}} considered an animalistic humanoid too? ... No love for her I see.
Only when she''s on my team.
You're joking, but I think I actually saw that movie with that turtle. Saying it was God awful is actually managing to understate just how bad it was.
We even have a {{champion:104}} without a cigar.
